list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: ask (someone) earnestly or humbly for something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she begged me to say nothing to her father
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô cầu xin tôi không nói gì với cha mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: ask for something, typically food or money, as charity or a gift.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a young woman was begging in the street
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một phụ nữ trẻ đang cầu xin trên đường phố
